title: Night at Glenn's Museum | Guests: Mark Meadows & Bill O'Reilly | 12/9/21
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss why the Left is scared, and Glenn theorizes it’s because their entertainment no longer entertains, only preaches. Glenn tells the story of hostages in the aftermath of Pearl Harbor. Former White House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows joins to discuss his lawsuit against Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi and the January 6 Committee. Bill O’Reilly joins for his weekly news recap to discuss President Biden’s phone call with Putin, Ukraine, and his upcoming tour with President Trump. Glenn and Stu discuss the possibility of a ghost haunting Glenn’s museum. Glenn and Stu discuss the Jussie Smollett trial and CNN’s Don Lemon’s role in the incident.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
